entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 08:07 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain and Fog

Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 100 %

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain and fog ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near Haro Strait this afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 08:29 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Periods of rain beginning late this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h except 60 gusting to 80 near Haro Strait overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 08:29 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:29 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
